value.title: Plan and implement a high availability and disaster recovery environment
value.excerpt: Data must be available when needed. Configure, test and manage a solution for high availability and disaster recovery using Azure tools and SQL Server tools.

topItems.title: Describe high availability and disaster recovery strategies
topItems.excerpt: Plan appropriate HA/DR strategy based on RTO and RPO. Choose best solution for IaaS or PaaS deployments or hybrid workloads.

topItems.title: Explore IaaS and PaaS platform tools for high availability and disaster recovery
topItems.excerpt: Deploy Windows Server Failover Cluster and AGs in Azure and hybrid environments. Configure temporal tables, geo-replication and auto failover groups.

topItems.title: Back up and restore databases
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement policy for recovering data in case of user error or failure of technology. Explore various options for how and where to backup and restore databases.

value.title: SC-300 part 3: Implement Access Management for Apps
value.excerpt: SC-300 part 3: Implement Access Management for Apps

topItems.title: Plan and design the integration of enterprise apps for SSO
topItems.excerpt: Plan and design the integration of enterprise apps for SSO

topItems.title: Implement and monitor the integration of enterprise apps for SSO
topItems.excerpt: Implement and monitor the integration of enterprise apps for SSO

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
value.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

value.title: Analyze images
value.excerpt: Analyze images

value.title: Authenticate apps to Azure services by using service principals and managed identities for Azure resources
value.excerpt: Securely authenticate apps to Azure to manage and access Azure services. Service principals and managed identities give your app an Azure AD identity.

value.title: Architect full-stack applications and automate deployments with GitHub
value.excerpt: In the language of your choice (Node.js, Python, or .NET), deploy an end-to-end solution to solve the real-world scenario of catching the bus. You'll learn how to architect a solution that uses Azure SQL Database, Azure Functions, Azure Static Web Apps, Logic Apps, Visual Studio Code, and GitHub Actions.

value.title: Automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps
value.excerpt: Learn to automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps that handle repetitive tasks, enforce team policies, and maintain a tidy repository.

value.title: Automate GitHub by using GitHub Script
value.excerpt: Learn to interact with the GitHub API from GitHub Actions by using GitHub Script.

value.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Introduction to blockchain on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to blockchain on Azure. See how blockchain allows business partners to trust each other's data without a central authority. You'll also learn a bit about how blockchain works. The goal is to help you decide if blockchain is a good choice for your scenario.

value.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure IoT, and describes Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure. This knowledge can help bring IoT to life for your organization and customers.

value.title: Deploy highly available solutions by using Azure SQL
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to deploy highly available solutions by using Azure SQL. You'll also look at architectures and how they affect availability.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Back up and restore databases
value.excerpt: Plan and implement policy for recovering data in case of user error or failure of technology. Explore various options for how and where to backup and restore databases.

value.title: Learn how to use Solidity
value.excerpt: Discover how Solidity can help you program smart contracts for the Ethereum blockchain platform.

value.title: Write Ethereum smart contracts by using Solidity
value.excerpt: Learn how to install tools that you can use to develop smart contracts.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Build a web API with Node.js and Express
value.excerpt: Use Express for Node.js to build RESTful APIs. Create and configure middleware to add things like logging and authentication/authorization. Use JavaScript/TypeScript with Express to create a Node.js web server with Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Collaborate with Git
value.excerpt: Use Git to track changes to source code and collaborate with other developers

value.title: Configure automatic deployment for Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Utilize Azure Resource Manager templates for deploying Azure SQL resources.

value.title: Configure Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure an Azure Application Gateway.

value.title: Configure Azure DNS
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure Azure DNS including custom domain names and record sets.

value.title: Configure Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure an internal or public load balancer.

value.title: Configure file and folder backups
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure backup and restore policies that meet your company's regulatory needs.

value.title: Configure network routing and endpoints
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure routes including endpoints and private links.

value.title: Configure virtual machine extensions
value.excerpt: You will learn how to use virtual machine extensions to automate virtual machine deployments.

value.title: Configure virtual network peering
value.excerpt: You will learn to configure a VNet peering connection and address transit and connectivity concerns.
